description: Stock Verification System - A React Native Expo application for stock verification with barcode scanning, item counting, and variance tracking
objectives: Enable staff to scan barcodes and verify stock quantities
Track variances between system and verified quantities
Support multiple user roles (Admin, Supervisor, Staff)
Provide offline support and real-time sync

features.name: Authentication
features.description: JWT-based authentication with role-based access control

features.name: Barcode Scanning
features.description: Scan barcodes to identify items using expo-barcode-scanner

features.name: Item Verification
features.description: Enter and verify stock quantities with photo proof

features.name: Variance Tracking
features.description: Track differences between system and verified quantities

features.name: CSV Export
features.description: Export verification data to CSV format

features.name: Offline Support
features.description: Work offline and sync when connection is available
